metaData.title: Accommodation Rosia Montana
metaData.text: Stay in a heritage house from the Historic Center of Roșia Montana, recently renovated with bathrooms and kitchen access. See also the hiking and bike trails to discover our area: roman galleries, gold mining industry, heritage buildings, mountains, lakes and many more. Rosia Montana, Alba, Apuseni Mountains, Transylvania - Romania.

headline.title: Plan your visit to Roșia Montană

specificArticles.text: We are located in the historic center of Rosia Montana 331, in a heritage house, that was a bank, medical center, cinema and then it was bought by our grandparents who work in mining industry, and used for living. We preserved the painting, the wooden floor, the windows, the heating with terracotta stoves, but we added new bathrooms and kitchen and now we offer accommodation and touristic services . Te rooms have separate entries from a common yard with hammocks, gazebo, green grass and a nice view to the Cânic massif. See below:

Beside accomodation we also offer:
Bikes for rent or (if needed) we can help you fix your bike.
Guided tours - see the bellow section.
Library - we have many books that you can read but most of them are in romanian (don't miss the newspapers and the books about Roșia)
Hammocks with a view and wifi access - relax in our yard
Playground for children - beside our house

Board games - In the library can be found many board games (Activity, Risk, Catan)
Sleighing - we have 2 sleighs that you can use during the winter on the sleigh slope beside the house
Badminton, tennis, football - we have paddles, balls and at ~15min walking is a synthetic field.

images.text: We rent bikes or we can organize guided tours on bikes with mechanical assistance on the trail.
Movie screenings in the garden - usually we play movies with the past of our village.

sections.text: How to reach us?

specificArticles.text:
We are in the historic center of Roșia Montană - Carpathian Mountains - Transylvania, 130km away from Cluj Napoca and 80km from Alba Iulia. You can reach us by:
car - set on your google maps gps 'Casa Petri Rosia Montana' and it will bring you to our house.
bus - the closest bus stations are in Câmpeni (15 km) or Abrud (10 km), but ask the driver to drop you off in Gura Roșiei (6 km) and hitchhike to the historic center.
train - the closest train station is in Alba Iulia. Beside is the bus station so you can take a bus from there.
airplane - the closest airport is in Cluj Napoca. From here you have to take a bus.
Once in the historic center of Rosia Montana you will see on the left a 3 floor block of flats (the only block from the market). So take it on the left beside this building and in front you will see our house (one floor white house). The entrance is through the yard on the left of the house. Please call us before arriving (~30min)
